DOC.criteria: Able give inform consent . Willing able followup visit examination . Less 80 year old . Have ejection fraction > 30 % . Have life expectancy > 1 year . PreOperative Currently participate clinical trial would conflict protocol . Unable meet study requirement . Currently pregnant . Require preoperative use intraaortic balloon pump . Have history bleed disorder history thromboembolic disease require anticoagulation therapy . Have congestive heart failure classify NYHA Class IV . Have aspirin allergy contraindication aspirin use . Previous coronary artery bypass surgery . Vasculitis nonatherosclerotic cause coronary artery disease .
